name: Enby Enough
description:
Enby Enough is a Twine game made for Nonbinary Game Jam 2021. But it's not super interactive, moreso a story in linked pieces.

This is very short because I came into this jam late, master procrastinator that I am.

I couldn't decide whether to make it prose or poetic, so I mixed a bit of both together.

This story is nonfiction, but also not an in-depth account of any particular life events. You can think of it as an informal manifesto that guides how I live my life outside of the binary.

Thank you for reading.
